title: How old would Harry Potter be on his birthday this year? - Quora

response.answer_text: Harry is 39 years old today. And to be sappy, I imagine he’ll be tearing up as usual, feeling to incredibly lucky to have a family that loves him, and they wake him up with homemade gifts and cards. And probably emotional because this is his last birthday before all his kids are at Hogwarts. Happy Birthday as always to the Beautiful JK Rowling as well.
